QuestData.Title: Blackfin's Booty
QuestData.Description: <A torn page precedes the latest entry, which reads:>$b$bOur self-proclaimed king will stop at nothing to acquire my family fortune. He has threatened and harassed me to no end.$b$bI can't take it anymore!$b$bI've buried the treasure and fed the map to Blackfin.$b$bThat should keep my cousin's grubby little mitts off of our precious heirlooms!
QuestData.LogDescription: You must slay the orca, Blackfin, to retrieve Gilblingle's Map.
QuestData.RewardText: This item was highly prized by the local gilblin population - even coveted by King Gurboggle, himself!
